synopsis.text: The principal of the elite Momiji Academy is perplexed by the powerful magic users that Urara Academy is able to produce. Seeking to uncover their secrets, she dispatches a young spy named Poppy to pose as a transfer student. However, upon his arrival, Poppy is baffled by the chaotic and whimsical nature of Urara Academy. Between the carefree students, the werewolf teacher Riiya, the scatterbrained sorcerer Seravi, and the ever-optimistic Chacha, Poppy struggles to maintain his cover. As he participates in Urara's eccentric activities, he starts to question his mission. Will the warmth and joy of this school community change his heart? Or will he betray their trust and deliver their secrets to the cold-hearted Momiji principal?
synopsis.author: anthropic.claude-v2:1
